title: Remove Discord & Telegram from Community section; replace with single X Communities link

requirements.summary: Update CommunitySection to remove Discord and Telegram cards, replace with single X Communities card linking to https://x.com/i/communities/2027059335088521312, and remove Discord/Telegram social icons from Footer
acceptanceCriteria: The Discord social card is no longer visible in the CommunitySection.
The Telegram social card is no longer visible in the CommunitySection.
A single X Communities card is displayed, linking to https://x.com/i/communities/2027059335088521312.
The X Communities card uses the same bold card style as the rest of the section.
No references to Discord or Telegram remain in the CommunitySection component.
The Footer social icon links also have Discord and Telegram icons removed, with only the X link retained.

file_operations.description: Remove the Discord and Telegram social platform cards from the community section. Replace them with a single X Communities card that links to https://x.com/i/communities/2027059335088521312. Ensure the X Communities card maintains the same bold card styling as existing social cards. Update any descriptive text or CTA copy to remove all references to Discord and Telegram.
Remove the Discord and Telegram social icon links from the footer. Keep only the X (Twitter) social icon link. Ensure the footer layout remains clean and properly styled after removing the two icons.
